attributes.comment:
It's really a disappointed proposal for us who are suffering from the USCIS
service. We do understand that USCIS want to solve their financial shortage. But
the basic concept is, as a client or customer, people shouldn't be just asked to
pay more without any guarantee of geting better or higher effcient service. Why
USCIS never propose a plan to improve their current terrible processing speed. I
think the most people would be more than happy to pay higher fee if they can
really speed up their desperately slow processing. This is a free and fair country.
But I am afraid to say we are the only customers who pay more but get less. In
summary, regarding the current situtation, I have to firmly say I strongly oppose
this proposal.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
